comingle.android.directory.ui.dialogsequences

Class DirectoryChoiceDialogSequence

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • comingle.android.directory.ui.dialogsequences.AlertDialogSequence<comingle.comms.message.Message>
        • comingle.android.directory.ui.dialogsequences.DirectoryChoiceDialogSequence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class DirectoryChoiceDialogSequence
extends AlertDialogSequence<comingle.comms.message.Message>
    An instance of the AlertDialogSequence, that prepends a choice directory dialog box before the directory setup sequence of the user's choice. Currently works for Wifi-direct and LAN directory.
    Author:
    Edmund S.L. Lam

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

    • Constructor Detail

      • DirectoryChoiceDialogSequence

        public DirectoryChoiceDialogSequence(android.app.Activity activity,
                             int adminPort,
                             java.lang.String defaultReqCode,
                             java.lang.String localDeviceId,
                             int row_res_id,
                             int name_res_id,
                             int loc_res_id,
                             int ip_addr_res_id)
        Basic Constructor
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity that embeds the dialog boxes.
        adminPort - the admin port number used by the constructed directory.
        defaultReqCode - the default request code of the directory.
        localDeviceId - the device ID of the application that runs this dialog sequence.
        row_res_id - Resource ID of row view for each node entry.
        name_res_id - Resource ID of name field for a node.
        loc_res_id - Resource ID of location field for a node.
        ip_addr_res_id - Resource ID of address field for a node.

      • getDirectorySetupSequence

        public AlertDialogSequence<comingle.comms.message.Message> getDirectorySetupSequence()
        Based on the chosen directory, return the corresponding directory setup sequence.
        Returns:
        Directory setup sequence, if directory has been chosen. Returns null otherwise.
